aboutme.Aboutme: I graduated from Ly Tu Trong college with softwere technology subject. i was taught: C #, Java, Php, Sql Server, Html, Css. i have some small projects about c#, java, php. After 2 months at HcosFace company As a trainee. I learned some interesting things. I feel interesting to Javascript. Now i can use javascript and angular framework at low level, use github, bootstrap. When i finish the education at my school. i wanna find a job to work and keep leanning more. Finaly i want to become a front-end developer
